item.title: Graceful shutdown of server in Go
item.description: Graceful shutdown Graceful shutdown refers to shutting down an application or service in a way that allows it to finish any ongoing tasks or transactions, clean up resources, and exit in an orderly and controlled manner.

item.title: Singleflight
item.description: Why Singleflight? Imagine you are running a service that calls a slow operation, let’s say it makes an expensive query to a database.
